spec_data.Name: python2-unpaddedbase64
spec_data.Description:
RFC 4648 specifies that Base64 should be padded to a multiple of 4 bytes
using "=" characters. However this conveys no benefit so many protocols
choose to use Base64 without the "=" padding.

Python 2 version.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 04:49:52 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Encode and decode Base64 without "=" padding
